title: What was invented first - the computer or the telephone? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on what you call a computer If we state a computer is a mechanical analog device , the oldest one we know of was created at around 100 BC (Antikythera mechanism) which was way before the first telephone. If we state a computer is a high-speed electronic digital programmable calculating device then ENIAC is the first one which was created in 1946 en way after the telephone.
